snippet: For months now, reports of abuse from former students have swirled about the ranch, prompting the authorities to execute a search warrant at Tierra Blanca.
abstract: Authorities execute search warrant at Tierra Blanca Ranch following months of reports of abuse from former students; police in New Mexico are searching for ranch's director Scott Chandler, for questioning amid allegations that troubled teenagers brought to youth program were beaten and shackled.
lead_paragraph: For months now, reports of abuse from former students have swirled about the ranch, prompting the authorities to execute a search warrant at Tierra Blanca.

headline.main: Lost Youths Are Found, but Ranch Director Is Sought Amid Claims of Beatings
headline.print_headline: Lost Youths Are Found, but Ranch Director Is Sought Amid Claims of Beatings
